programme.title: Хулиганы
programme.desc: Восемь дерзких парней довели своих девушек до нервного срыва и принятия жестких решений. Они отправляют их в Школу на перевоспитание. Конечная цель этого мероприятия – воспитать из своих вторых половинок настоящих джентльменов и спасти разваливающиеся отношения. Два месяца молодые люди будут учиться этикету, уважению и любви, забыв о своих амбициях и скверном характере. Тот, кто не сможет победить себя и не выполнит задания, покидает проект, а его возлюбленная должна будет сделать выбор – дать последний шанс или расстаться навсегда.

programme.title: Детективы Анны Малышевой. Сфинксы северных ворот
programme.desc: По мотивам одноименного романа Анны Малышевой. Романтическая поездка за город превратилась в кошмар. Возлюбленный Александры обвинен в убийстве. И только ее невероятное упорство, профессиональные знания и вера в его невиновность, помогут Саше снять с любимого человека страшные обвинения, раскрыть кровавую семейную тайну и найти похищенный много лет назад шедевр.

programme.title: Детективы Анны Малышевой. Сфинксы северных ворот

programme.title: Давай разведемся!
programme.desc: Это жизненные истории о некогда счастливых супружеских парах, которые принимают мучительное и тяжелое решение развестись. Суд в режиме реального времени разбирает семейные дела, находит объективную правду и решает, на чьей она стороне.

programme.title: Давай разведемся!
programme.desc: Это жизненные истории о некогда счастливых супружеских парах, которые принимают мучительное и тяжелое решение развестись. Суд в режиме реального времени разбирает семейные дела, находит объективную правду и решает, на чьей она стороне.

programme.title: Наша Russia
programme.desc: Суровые мужчины и не менее суровые женщины в исполнении Михаила Галустяна и Сергея Светлакова "бичуют и песочат" абсурдность российской жизни в скетч-шоу "Наша Russia" . Не секрет, что некоторые имена этого популярного скетчкома стали нарицательными, а многие шутки разошлись на цитаты. Да что скрывать, подчас мы узнаем себя в персонажах "Наша Russia"! Гей-фрезеровщик Иван Дулин и его начальник Михалыч, таджикские гастарбайтеры Равшан и Джамшуд, депутаты Мамонов и Пронин, четкие пацаны из Краснодара Славик и Димон, учительница-вымогательница Снежана Денисовна, бомжи Сифон и Борода, мужчина, разговаривающий с телевизором, – забавные приключения и нелепые выходки этих и многих других героев популярного юмористического шоу любого рассмешат до слез.

programme.title: Детективы Анны Малышевой. Сфинксы северных ворот
programme.desc: По мотивам одноименного романа Анны Малышевой. Романтическая поездка за город превратилась в кошмар. Возлюбленный Александры обвинен в убийстве. programme.title: Урфин Джюс возвращается
programme.desc: Элли и ее верный пес Тотошка снова оказываются в Волшебной стране в самое подходящее время. Власть в Изумрудном городе опять пытается захватить коварный Урфин Джюс, который хоть и потерял армию деревянных солдат, но не отказался от своей вредной привычки — портить всем жизнь. В руках Урфина теперь волшебная книга колдуньи Гингемы, которая исполняет любое желание ее хозяина, а значит, Страшила Мудрый, Храбрый Лев и Железный Дровосек в опасности. Элли, Тотошка и их новый приятель Тим решают помочь жителям Волшебной страны. Тем более, Тиму нравится Элли, а что не сделаешь ради любви? Например, глупость. Но ошибки совершает каждый, а вот исправлять их умеют немногие.

programme.title: Дрянные девчонки
programme.desc: Проведя детство в Африке с родителями-зоологами, Кэйди Хэрон думала, что знает всё про правило "выживает сильнейший". Но закон джунглей полностью пересматривается, когда домашняя 15-летняя девушка в первый раз попадает в обычную школу и влюбляется в бывшего парня самой подлой девчонки в школе.

programme.title: Это очень забавная история
programme.desc: 16-летний Крэйг переживает депрессию и пытается найти помощь в клинике для душевнобольных. Там он случайно попадает в отделение для взрослых, а один из пациентов, Бобби, вскоре становится наставником Крэйга и одновременно – его протеже. Юноша также проникается симпатией к одной из пациенток – своей ровеснице Ноэлль. Всего за пять дней Крэйгу предстоит очень многое узнать о жизни, дружбе, любви и о тех трудностях, с которыми сопряжена пора взросления.

programme.title: Чемпионат Европы по футболу 2020. Австрия - Северная Македония
programme.desc: Главное соревнование национальных сборных, проводимое под руководством УЕФА. Соревнование проводится каждые 4 года, начиная с 1960 года, и проходит между чемпионатами мира. Первоначально турнир назывался Кубок европейских наций, а в 1968 году название сменили на чемпионат Европы по футболу, и турнир получил официальный статус.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Criminal Minds shows everyday life of an elite team of special agents who work in the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit. They are trained to analyse line of thinking of criminals and foretell their next step and so prevent evil from happening. These specialists come to the rescue when all forces of police are engaged but the criminal is not detected. The agents use their unbelievable psychological methods, make themselves think like a criminal, analyse their characters and personalities.

programme.title: Inspector Rex
programme.desc: On the streets of Vienna there's a new Kommissar, Kommissar Rex. After Rex's handler is killed, Richie Moser, newly divorced, finds himself drawn to Rex and breaks him out of the police center. And the new partnership is born. Rex uses his abilities to help track down the criminals and protect the innocent – and prevent his handler from falling in love. After Moser is killed in the line of duty (Season 4 : Ep 4), a reluctant Rex gets another new partner, Alex Brandtner. In Season 8, Marc Hoffmann is now Rex's partner, and he works along side Niki Herzog. Season 11 sees Rex relocated to Rome, Italy and he now has a new partner. Rex: During the series Rex was played by two different dogs.

programme.title: Inspector Rex
programme.desc: The quintesential cop/dog show. Set in and around Vienna (and later in Rome) Rex is a German Shepherd dog who works in the police department as a cadaver dog, a sniffer dog (for both contraband and narcotics) and as another pair of eyes and ears for his team. Rex often helps in resolving troubling situations such as helping a young girl who is in shock, preventing a woman from committing suicide or helping to get his colleague's mobile phone when a crime has been committed. There is also a strong element of humour in this show with Rex frequently playing pranks on his human colleagues while at the same time proving to be smarter than they are when it comes to solving crimes. If you are a fan of police procedurals or are a dog lover then you won't want to miss an episode.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: Meet an extraordinary pair- Jane Rizzoli, a Boston detective in the Homicide Unit and Dr. Maura Isles, the Commonwealth of Massachusetts' Chief Medical Examiner. They make a great team despite their differences and together with their colleagues, these two women put themselves in dangerous situations on a daily basis, solving various difficult cases, fighting crime and catching killers in this thrilling series inspired by the Maura Isles/Jane Rizzoli series of novels by an author Tess Gerritsen.

programme.title: The Blacklist: Redemption
programme.desc: In the series "The Blacklist", Raymond "Red" Reddington, the most wanted criminal by the FBI in the world, decided to start working with the FBI and gave a list of criminals with whom he cooperated. "The Blacklist: Redemption" is a spin-off of this series. A group of elite mercenaries from Redington's list solves problems that the government is afraid of moving. In this way they want to redeem their faults.

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: The Americans is a spy drama series about a seemingly typical American married couple, Philip and Elizabeth Jenkins, who live with their two children, Paige and Henry, in a Washington D.C. suburb in the eighties. As it turns out the couple are actually Russian KGB officers on a Cold War mission, trained to pose as Americans. Other than following the assignments they get, the show also explores the relationship between the two.

programme.title: Manifest
programme.desc: On an unassuming flight from Jamaica to New York, Montego Air Flight 828 hits a patch of brief, terrifying turbulence. When the 191 passengers and crew members land at New York, they're told five and a half years have passed while they were airborne. Presumed dead by the world, the passengers struggle to come to terms with their existence as relatives and loved ones are not as they were before, and experience uncontrollable hallucinations and premonitions. This thrilling supernatural drama series is full of unexpected twists, as those involved unravel the unsettling mystery behind their presumed deaths.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio
programme.desc: In order to support her ten children, Evelyn Ryan enters a commercial jingle-writing contest.

programme.title: Younger
programme.desc: Younger is an amazing combination of comedy, drama and romance, following Liza, a 40-year old woman who pretends to be much younger in order to get a dream job. She says she is 26 and gets a job she has wanted so much. She finds herself in the highly competitive world of publishing and now has to balance her real life and her made up one, with new friends and colleagues. Is it possible for a divorced mother to reinvent her life and manage her career and private life pretending to be someone much younger?

programme.title: Dr. Ken
programme.desc: American sitcom starring Ken Jeong. Meet Dr Ken Park – he's a general practitioner with a wonderful wife and two bright kids. Dr Ken might seem to have it all – but what he lacks is tact, humility and consideration for others. The straight-talking Ken jokes his way through his personal and professional life as he tries to balance the two. Also starring Suzy Nakamura, Tisha Campbell and Jonathan Slavin.

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Fran Fine, a fashionista and make-up saleswoman, shows up on the doorstep of the Sheffield family and becomes the nanny to Maggie, Brighton, and Grace, the children of British Broadway producer Maxwell Sheffield. The householf is managed by the acerbic butler Niles, who supports Fran, and often visited by Maxwell's business partner C.C. Babcock, who is determined to undermine her, as she sees Maxwell's attraction to Fran but is interested in him herself.

programme.desc: Fran Fine, a fashionista and make-up saleswoman, shows up on the doorstep of the Sheffield family and becomes the nanny to Maggie, Brighton, and Grace, the children of British Broadway producer Maxwell Sheffield. The householf is managed by the acerbic butler Niles, who supports Fran, and often visited by Maxwell's business partner C.C. Babcock, who is determined to undermine her, as she sees Maxwell's attraction to Fran but is interested in him herself.

programme.title: Happily Divorced
programme.desc: In their 18 years of marriage, a middle-aged couple tries to move on with their lives after the husband confesses he's gay. Based on Fran Drescher and Peter Marc Jacobson's real experiences.

programme.title: Kevin Can Wait
programme.desc: Kevin Can Wait is an American comedy series starring Kevin James as Kevin Gable, a police officer who finally retires. He has a whole retirement plan developed, hoping for a carefree life from now on, spent in fun activities with his fellow retired friends. But his family life ruins it all. It turns out that being at home with his wife and three children ain't so easy. His pension paycheck is too small, so he has to continue doing different jobs to support his family. With hypochondriac son Jack, daughter Sara with anger management issues, and eldest daughter Kendra quitting college and wanting to marry, things go a lot different than he imagined.

Jerry and his friends (best friend George Costanza, former girlfriend Elaine Benes) are going through everyday life, discussing various situations and their eccentric personalities are not always helping them out.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: American sitcom. Melanie, Joy and Victoria are three friends from Los Angeles who find themselves making an unplanned stop in the City of Cleveland. When they discover that life in Ohio is a world away from the LA-existence that they've just left behind in California, these three feisty females decide to stay. Taken with this new-found city, they rent a house from an elderly caretaker named Elka. This comedy series is about getting older, dealing with the past, dating, relationships, dilemmas and friendship. Starring Valerie Bertinelli, Jane Leeves, Wendie Malick and Betty White.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: American sitcom about Christy, a single mother-of-two in recovery. Even after years of being sober, she is struggling with her addictions. She tries to stay positive but she is pushed to her limits when her mother, also a recovering alcoholic, returns back into her life. Together, this troubled daughter/mother duo try to rebuild their relationship and support each other to stay clean. The quarrels with her boss, teenage daughter and ex-husband do not make Christy's life any easier either. This comedy series deals not only with issues of addiction but a number of important topics in society including teen pregnancy, homelessness, domestic violence and death. Starring Anna Faris and Allison Janney as Christy and Bonnie Plunkett.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Captivating American sitcom that follows the lives of Ted Mosby and his friends- a long-lasting couple Marshall Eriksen and Lily Aldrin, womanizer Barney Stinson, and news reporter and Ted's love interest Robin Scherbatsky, who all live in New York City. The story starts in 2030 as Ted tells his children the story of how he meet their mother, and goes back to 2005 when Ted started his quest of finding true love and the ''one'' for him. During his journey, he and his friends will have lots of funny, sad, unexpected and otrageous escapades.

programme.title: Dr. Ken
programme.desc: American sitcom starring Ken Jeong. Meet Dr Ken Park – he's a general practitioner with a wonderful wife and two bright kids. Dr Ken might seem to have it all – but what he lacks is tact, humility and consideration for others. The straight-talking Ken jokes his way through his personal and professional life as he tries to balance the two. Also starring Suzy Nakamura, Tisha Campbell and Jonathan Slavin.

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Comedy drama, starring Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Tom Wilkinson and Dev Patel. A widow looking for a new lease of life joins a group of elderly British tourists at a run-down Indian hotel, run by the energetic and endlessly optimistic Sonny. As he struggles to achieve his dream of getting the establishment up and running, his guests, including a gay man returning to India to find his lost love, an unhappily married couple and a wheelchair-bound woman who can't wait to return to England, discover the delights of their crumbling surroundings.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: It is the story of one Mr. Fox and his wild-ways of hen heckling, turkey taking and cider sipping, nocturnal, instinctive adventures. He has to put his wild days behind him and do what fathers do best: be responsible. He is too rebellious. He is too wild. He is going to try "just one more raid" on the three nastiest, meanest farmers that are Boggis, Bunce and Bean. It is a tale of crossing the line of family responsibilities and midnight adventure and the friendships and awakenings of this country life that is inhabited by Fantastic Mr. Fox and his friends.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. Situācija saasinās, kad kādā no glābšanas operācijām bojā iet viens no ugunsdzēsējiem, un viņa kolēģi notikušajā vaino paši sevi viens otru. Tomēr viņiem nākas pārvarēt savas nesaskaņas, jo uz nelaimes gadījumu vietām jādodas kā vienotai un saskaņotai komandai.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās

programme.title: Kandisa Renuāra
programme.desc: Kandisa varbūt neizskatās pēc tipiskas izmeklētājas. Viņa ir sievišķīga blondīne ar mobilo telefonu rozā vāciņos, viņai patīk augsti papēži, kostīmiņi un spilgti krāsotas lūpas. Piedevām Kandisa ir vientuļā māte, audzina četrus bērnus, un pēdējos desmit gadus nav strādājusi. Nu viņa atgriežas darbā, pie kam vadošā amatā – par slepkavību izmeklēšanas nodaļas vadītāju. Pa šiem desmit gadiem policijas darbā daudz kas ir mainījies – tehnoloģijas ir attīstījušās, izmeklēšanas metodes ir citas. Priekšniecība ne īpaši tic Kandisas spējām, un viņas padotie galīgi nav sajūsmā par tādu vadītāju. Īpaši neapmierināts un skeptisks ir kapteinis Djumā, kurš jau mēnesi ir vadījis komandu, un pats cerējis uz vietu, kuru nu ieņēmusi Kandisa. Lai arī Kandisa jau pirmajā izmeklēšanā pierāda, ka viņai piemīt īpaša intuīcija un spējas, kas palīdz pamanīt to, kas citiem paslīd garām, padotie ātri vien uzraksta iesniegumus par pārvietošanu – viņi nav gatavi strādāt Kandisas vadībā. Viegli nebūs, tomēr Kandisai nenāks ne prātā padoties. Tomēr viņas dzīve nesastāvēs tikai no darba un bērniem – tieši kaimiņos dzīvo patīkams vīrietis, uz kuru Kandisa atstās neaizmirstamu iespaidu jau pēc pirmās tikšanās reizes

programme.title: Tie esam mēs
programme.desc: Seriāla piektā sezona turpina sekot ģimenes dzīvei un attiecībām dažādos laika periodos.

programme.title: Tie esam mēs
programme.desc: This heart-warming family dramedy series follows the extraordinary lives of two parents Jack and Rebecca Pearson, and their three children known as the ''Big Three'' Kevin, Kate and Randall through several different time frames. Rebecca had a difficult pregnancy with triplets, and after they lost one child, the Pearsons decide to adopt Randall who was born the same day. As years go by, we have a chance to see their incredible journeys and struggles after Jack's death- Rebecca's new marriage, Randall's story as he becomes a successful finance professional and a father of three, Kevin's life as an actor while struggling to be taken seriously and Kate's struggles with weight issues and everyday ups and downs as they show us the incredible power of love and moments of joy, triumph and heartbreak.

programme.title: Grejas anatomija
programme.desc: Sietlu piemeklē liela vētra, kā rezultātā slimnīcā ierodas aizvien jauni pacienti. Alekss un Džo iesprostoti mājās un abi nolemj sarīkot otru medusmēnesi. Tikmēr Meredita konfrontē Ričardu par viņa dzīves atgriešanu sliedēs.

programme.title: Grejas anatomija
programme.desc: Sietlu turpina caurstrāvot vētra. Slimnīcā pazūdot elektrībai, ārstiem pieejami limitēti resursi pacientu dzīvības glābšanai. Meredita izmisīgi mēģina piekļūt Cecei saistībā ar viņas sirds transplantāciju. Tikmēr Ovens, Amēlija un Tedijs konfrontē savu sarežģīto situāciju.

programme.title: Notiesāšana
programme.desc: Strādājoša māte iziet cauri juridiskajai skolai, lai varētu reprezentēt savu brāli, kas nepatiesi apsūdzēts par slepkavību. Viņš arī zaudējis visas iespējas savai aizstāvībai ar valsts garantēto aizstāvi.

programme.title: Turpini gatavot ar Džeimiju Oliveru
programme.desc: Join celebrity chef Jamie Oliver as he brings this brand new cooking show developed to help the viewer cope with these unprecedented times during lockdown. Using whatever ingredients are readily available in your kitchen and within a limited budget, Jamie demonstrates how to create delicious, tasty meals. Each episode features several dishes including pork stir-fry, steamed dumplings and the ultimate roast beef sarnie; vegetarian chilli, pasta with three sauces and how to cheat when making carbonara; and how to make the best use of what's availabke from your local corner shop to make a perfect Friday night curry.

programme.title: Rezidents
programme.desc: The Chastain staff works together to diagnose a mother-daughter pair who both come in with symptoms that make it difficult to determine their conditions. Devon deals with an unexpected visit from his mother and Conrad and Nic try to figure out the best time to tell everyone their big news. Meanwhile, Bell deals with an over-eager fan of his show who ends up needing treatment at Chastain and Mina makes a bold move when she realizes her visa is about to expire.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. Situācija saasinās, kad kādā no glābšanas operācijām bojā iet viens no ugunsdzēsējiem, un viņa kolēģi notikušajā vaino paši sevi viens otru. Tomēr viņiem nākas pārvarēt savas nesaskaņas, jo uz nelaimes gadījumu vietām jādodas kā vienotai un saskaņotai komandai.

programme.title: Kāsla metode
programme.desc: Vai zināji, ka slavenā detektīvu rakstnieka Kāsla pilnais vārds ir Ričards Edgars Aleksandrs Rodžerss Kāsls? Tieši šo vārdu tu dzirdēsi ļoti atbildīgā brīdī – kad Beketa sniegs atbildi uz Kāsla bildinājumu, ko viņš beidzot saņemsies izteikt. Ko viņa atbildēs un kā attīstīsies abu attiecības, ņemot vērā, ka Beketa saņēmusi kārdinošu darba piedāvājumu citā pilsētā? To tu uzzināsi, skatoties sestās sezonas sērijas! Savukārt savulaik iemīļotā seriāla "Doktors Hauss" cienītāji būs patīkami pārsteigti, ieraugot Beketas jauno pārinieci – kas ir neviena cita kā daktere Kadija jeb Lisa Edelšteina. Tevi gaida neparastas lietas, negaidīti notikumu pavērsieni un iespēja risināt izmeklēšanas mīklas un cilvēcisko attiecību pārpratumus.

programme.title: Grejas anatomija
programme.desc: Grejas anatomija ir drāma par intensīvo medicīnas apmācību, ko papildina jautrība, seksīgums un reizēm traģiskums to cilvēku dzīvēs, kuri drīz vien apjautīs, ka ne medicīna, ne arī attiecības var tikt dalītas melnajā un baltajā.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Meredita spriež par Linka vienaldzīgo attieksmi par pacienta ārstēšanu. Megija uztraucas, ka Ričards, Džeksons un Katerīna nav vienojušies par Katerīnas diagnozi.

programme.title: Bīstamās mammas
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis ar Touretes sindromu devies ceļojumā, līdzi ņemot savas nesen mirušās mātes pelnus.

programme.title: Ķertie
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis ar Touretes sindromu devies ceļojumā, līdzi ņemot savas nesen mirušās mātes pelnus.

programme.title: Grant
programme.desc: A three-part documentary series examining the life of the 18th President of the United States of America, Ulysses S. Grant, revealing his journey from humble beginnings to the highest office in the country. With epic, dramatised reconstructions alongside interviews with expert historians, the series comprehensibly depicts Grant's life as a man who helped to lead his country through one its most turbulent eras. A fascinating encapsulation of Grant, covering his years as a soldier fighting in a divided country, before emerging as a stoic champion for equality amongst all Americans.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers' contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Custom Cars: Las Vegas
programme.desc: Counting Cars is an American reality TV series, which is the third spinoff of TV series Pawn Stars. It is filmed in Las Vegas, Nevada, and follows daily activities at Count's Kustoms, a company owned and operated by Legendary Danny Koker a.k.a. The Count, its main aim is to restore and customize all kinds of motor vehicles, automobiles, and motorcycles in particular. Danny and his team stop at nothing to find, get, transform and finally sell the greatest rides of all time, being creative about every project.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Large and dangerous cats are stalking suburban neighbourhoods throughout the United States. The MonsterQuest investigation team goes undercover to examine evidence and eyewitness accounts to reveal the identity of this beast before it kills again.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMS and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. Pawn Stars takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold & Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family--grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey--jointly run the family business, and there's clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. It's up to them to determine what's real and what's fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyone's mind, "What's the story behind it"? and "What's it worth?"

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is an American TV series in a documentary style focusing on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the day's championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMS and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. Pawn Stars takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold & Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family--grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey--jointly run the family business, and there's clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. It's up to them to determine what's real and what's fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyone's mind, "What's the story behind it"? and "What's it worth?"

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold & Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers' contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Assembly Required
programme.desc: Tim Allen and Richard Karn believe that dirty cars are no laughing matter, so they challenge the makers to create a mobile car wash capable of making any car sparkle. But first, the makers have to build a handheld vacuum.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is an American TV series in a documentary style focusing on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Roswell: The First Witness
programme.desc: Paranormal documentary. In 1947 something fell from the sky and crash-landed in Roswell, New Mexico. Officially this object was a US military surveillance balloon. But according to modern legend and popular UFO folklore, an extra-terrestrial spacecraft. First on the scene of this mysterious incident was Major Jesse Marcel of the US Air Force. For this programme, Major Marcel's grandchildren use modern technology, their grandfather's personal documents and new evidence to try to uncover the truth of what happened that day in 1947.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the day's championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There is getting in touch with nature and then there are these lot. Imagine ridding yourself of the complexities of modern life and living completely off the grid, this TV documentary series highlights the lives of several individuals doing just that and shows viewers how they survive outside of society. Mountain Men covers individuals making a living by hunting and trapping from the Appalachian Mountains to the Rocky Mountains of Alaska. In times of winter, the cold and snowy conditions makes life almost impossible but these men show how to thrive and earn money in such difficult circumstances.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold & Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There is getting in touch with nature and then there are these lot. Imagine ridding yourself of the complexities of modern life and living completely off the grid, this TV documentary series highlights the lives of several individuals doing just that and shows viewers how they survive outside of society. programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMS and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. Pawn Stars takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold & Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family--grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey--jointly run the family business, and there's clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. It's up to them to determine what's real and what's fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyone's mind, "What's the story behind it"? and "What's it worth?"

programme.title: The Food That Built the World
programme.desc: This documentary miniseries tells fascinating stories of the people behind the food that built America and follows the ups and downs of several now-household product names such as Henry Heinz, Will and John Kellogg, Frank and Forrest Mars, Charlie Post and his ambitious daughter Marjorie, Milton Hershey, Harland Sanders, McDonald brothers, and the nearly-forgotten John Pemberton and his invention, Coca-Cola. These people were visionaries with ambition, drive, a thirst for success and a willingness to risk everything on an untested, untried idea for a food that no one had experienced before, in times when failure and bankruptcy were just a step away. Each story is told by talented actors and supported by interviews with food historians, history professors and food writers.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Tobot is a South Korean animated TV series featuring transforming cars, some of which are designed after Kia Motors vehicles. Twin brothers Ryan and Kory live with their father, Dr. Franklin Char, robot technology expert, in a small town. Dr. Franklin Char has become physically handicapped after a car accident, in which his wife died. But he holds up well and decides to create robots for his sons, who will protect and support them and be their friends. Twins are going to have unforgettable adventures.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Maxwell "Max" McGrath's whole life changes after moving in with his mother in the tiny city of Copper Canyon. Meeting the typical people you usually do, new friends and bullies, there are other looking after him; super-villains. Hunting him down because of the TURBO energy he possesses, Max must join a secret organisation that his father started to defeat Trans-Human Industries from taking over the world. Nobody else knows about Max's powers and they are hidden from the public with the help of his friend Steel known as Ultra-Link to prevent his powers from going critical. Throughout the show, with the aid of N-TEK led by Max's uncle Ferrus, Max and Steel will discover the mystery of Steel's past and discover what actually happened to Max's father and uncover the dark secrets of N-TEK. This CGI-Animation television series was co-produced by Mattel Playground Production, Nerd Corps Entertainment and FremantleMedia Kids & Entertainment. Based on the Mattel action-figure sharing the same name, Max steel premiered on Disney XD in 2013.

programme.title: Jungle Bunch
programme.desc: This CGI animation follows the story of 'The Jungle Bunch', a self-proclaimed group of disparate jungle animals who have taken it upon themselves to protect other creatures from the many threats and dangers that can lurk in the depths of the jungle. Led by warrior tiger Maurice (who is actually a penguin!), the crew are made up of Maurice's adopted son, Junior, who is learning the ropes; Miguel the strong gorilla, tarsier Gilbert, who has all the smarts; compassionate Batricia, the bat; and the inseparable toads Al and Bob. The troop represent justice and hope and are always ready for fun and adventure.

programme.title: Son of Big Foot
programme.desc: A teenage boy journeys to find his missing father only to discover that he's actually Bigfoot.

programme.title: Jessie
programme.desc: Jessie is an American comedy television series about a young girl, Jessie Prescott from Texas who moves to New York and becomes a nanny in a wealthy family. The Ross family she works for lives in a multimillion-dollar penthouse on the Upper West Side. The four kids, Emma, Luke, Ravi and Zuri are quite uncontrolled, but Jessie gets on well with them very fast and the real fun begins. Step by step Jessie makes every day of quiet and steady life of the Ross family feel like it's Christmas, as she is full of energy, jokes and enthusiasm.

programme.title: Andi Mack
programme.desc: On the eve of her 13th birthdday, Andi's (Peyton Elizabeth Lee) free spirited big sister, Bex, returns home from her nomadic travels around the world. Andi is delighted at the prospect of having an exciting accomplice who can help her to bend her mother's strict rules and who she can learn from. However, it is soon diisclosed that Bex is, in fact, Andi's real mother and Celia, who Andi thought was her mother, is really her grandmother. This shocking revelation forces Andi to embark on a contemplative journey of self diiscovery. She is helped by her best friends Cyrus and Buffy who are also trying to find their way in the world. This is a heart warming coming-of-age tale that touches on some adult themes in a positive manner while also being loads of fun!

programme.title: Wizards of Waverly Place
programme.desc: Wizards of Waverly Place is an American fantasy teen sitcom focusing on three Russo siblings with magical abilities. The Russo family are nothing but ordinary: their father is a former family wizard, and their mother is mortal. When the Russo siblings complete their wizard training, they have to participate in a competition to decide who will become the Family Wizard and keep magical powers forever, while the others lose their powers and become mortals.

programme.title: Wizards of Waverly Place

programme.title: Gormiti
programme.desc: CGI animated series with action and adventure. For thousands of years, the Island of Gorm has lived in peace. But the Gormiti, the residents of the island, have always known that harmony would not last forever. They knew the fearful Magor, the leader of the Volcano tribe, would one day return for revenge. The Gormiti warriors from four other tribes – Earth, Air, Sea, and Forest – must work together to defeat him and his tribe.

programme.title: Metalions
programme.desc: Meet Elon, an eight-year-old genius inventor, who one day while cleaning finds a summoning device and scooter left to him by his grandfather. When Elon gets in trouble, device summons an ancient warrior (a Metalion) named Leo who saves him and explains that he's a Infinite Warrior, an ancient race of powerful beasts devoted to help others and that he used to be his grandfather's friend. Leo, saddened that Earth's energy had been exploited by recklessness of humans, asks Elon to help him find all the Archean Stones to restore the Earth's energy. Together with other Infinite Warriors, they start searching for stones, having heroic adventures in a quest to save the world from evil Sigma Corp.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Secrets of Hidden Spinjitsu
programme.desc: Ninjago was created by the First Master of Spinjitzu using the Four Golden Weapons. Wu and Garmadon fought, and the older brother, Garmadon, was banished to the Underworld. Peace didn't last for long, as Garmadon had sent Skeletons from the underworld to steal the four Weapons. Sensei Wu found four teenagers to train as ninja; Kai, Jay, Cole, and Zane, one of whom, Kai, had a sister, Nya, who had been captured by the Skeletons.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Secrets of Hidden Spinjitsu

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Elementary-school student Valt Aoi is crazy about Beyblade and is best friends with Shu Kurenai, who is a prodigy at the game and has been named to the national Beyblade tournament's final four. Inspired by his friend's accomplishment, Valt makes it his goal to reach the tournament himself. The first step on the road to the big leagues is to win his district tournament, which includes some tough opponents. As he makes his way up the ladder, Valt reaches new heights and extends his circle of friends, eventually -- unknowingly -- dreaming of becoming the best Blader in the world.

programme.title: Cave Club
programme.desc: Welcome to a land of adventure, exploration, and even dinosaurs. Join five fearless friends as they discover the unexpected origins of some of today's most popular trends and tackle relatable issues. These B.F.F.s will be the first to see and do everything-starting with the first-ever best friends' group, Cave Club.

programme.title: Ballerina
programme.desc: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera house.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission
programme.desc: There is a mission and it is not an easy one! Heartlake City is under a lot of pressure from some very bad people who do very bad things. The LEGO Friends are five young girls who all have a really close friendship: best friends Andrea, Emma, Mia, Olivia and Stephanie have extremely kind girls who decide to dedicate all of their time into protecting the people who live in the city. Whether they are saving people from a huge fire; stopping mayhem caused by the Alvahbots or ridding the sea from a load of unwanted trash – the LEGO Friends will always have a solution and will do it without complaining! Every day, the girls are faced with a brand new challenge that is completely unexpected. Who knows what the challenge will be; how will they fix the problem? Children's animated television series.

Led by warrior tiger Maurice (who is actually a penguin!), the crew are made up of Maurice's adopted son, Junior, who is learning the ropes; Miguel the strong gorilla, tarsier Gilbert, who has all the smarts; compassionate Batricia, the bat; and the inseparable toads Al and Bob. The troop represent justice and hope and are always ready for fun and adventure.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Maxwell "Max" McGrath's whole life changes after moving in with his mother in the tiny city of Copper Canyon. Meeting the typical people you usually do, new friends and bullies, there are other looking after him; super-villains. Hunting him down because of the TURBO energy he possesses, Max must join a secret organisation that his father started to defeat Trans-Human Industries from taking over the world. Nobody else knows about Max's powers and they are hidden from the public with the help of his friend Steel known as Ultra-Link to prevent his powers from going critical. Throughout the show, with the aid of N-TEK led by Max's uncle Ferrus, Max and Steel will discover the mystery of Steel's past and discover what actually happened to Max's father and uncover the dark secrets of N-TEK. This CGI-Animation television series was co-produced by Mattel Playground Production, Nerd Corps Entertainment and FremantleMedia Kids & Entertainment. Based on the Mattel action-figure sharing the same name, Max steel premiered on Disney XD in 2013.

programme.title: Tas ir Džojs
programme.desc: Tas ir Džojs! Ja uzskatāt, ka katrai problēmai ir garlaicīgs risinājums, jūs nepazīstat Džoju! Ar draugiem Olivu un Jasīnu viņš atradīs atjautīgākos un negaidītākos risinājumus, lai izkultos no nelāgām situācijām un palīdzētu citiem.

programme.title: Tas ir Džojs

programme.title: Jautrīši
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti Jautrajā pilsētā. Tā ir miermīlīga burvju vieta, kurā dzīvo mazi cilvēciņi Jautrīši un jaukas, pūkains radības Mošķīši. Viņi dzīvo tikai pēc viena noteikuma – ne dienu bez piedzīvojuma.

programme.title: Remija un Bū
programme.desc: Unikāla mazas meitenes Remijas un lieliska robota Bū draudzība. Remija ir zinātkāra sešus gadus veca meitene ar unikālu labāko draugu – Bū, lielu, mīkstu, rozā robotu. Ar Remijas mērķtiecību un Bū prasmēm viņu dienas Delfīnbejā ir abu iztēles radītu piedzīvojumu pilnas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Mans mazais ponijs: draudzība ir brīnums
programme.desc: Saņemot brīdinājumu par šausmīgu pareģojumu, Princese Celestia uz Poniju zemi sūta savu studenti Sparklu. Tā viņa cer pārliecināties, ka viss tiek sagatavots kā nākas, un ka jauniete iegūs vairākus draugus.

programme.title: Mans mazais ponijs: draudzība ir brīnums
programme.desc: Saņemot brīdinājumu par šausmīgu pareģojumu, Princese Celestia uz Poniju zemi sūta savu studenti Sparklu. Tā viņa cer pārliecināties, ka viss tiek sagatavots kā nākas, un ka jauniete iegūs vairākus draugus.

programme.title: Kindi Kids
programme.desc: Animated children's series based on the toy range of the same name. Kindi Kids follows the adventures of a delightful group of colourful humans that live playfully in tribes. Each tribe is centered around a unique aspect or behaviour, such as the Shoppets, who are mischievous creatures always looking to cause destruction to their magical world, Rainbow Kindi. All of the tribes live in Rainbow Kindi, a vibrant and vivid world where the characters interact, often leading to hilarious events and situations. Young children are invited to join the colourful characters as they enjoy yet another series of amazing adventures.

programme.title: Alas klubs "Cave Club"
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti piedzīvojumu, izpētes un pat dinozauru pasaulē. Kopā ar pieciem draugiem atklājiet negaidītu mūsdienas populārāko tendenču izcelsmi un risiniet visiem zināmas problēmas. Šie labākie draugi būs pirmie, kas visu redzēs un darīs, sākot ar pašu pirmo labāko draugu grupu "Alas klubs".

programme.title: Enchantimals: Saulainā Savanna
programme.desc: Brīnummeža draugi palīdz Saulainās Savannas iemītniekiem sagatavoties Spīguļojošajai Izrādei, paši iesaistoties vizuļojošajā jautrībā un vienlaikus gūstot svarīgas mācības. Saulainajā Savannā kopā vienmēr ir jautrāk.

programme.title: Motopilsētas maģija
programme.desc: Ar bagātīgu iztēli apveltītais Bens ar burvju otu un klasiskajiem Motauna ritmiem pārveido savu pilsētu, iedvešot dzīvību raibos ielu mākslas darbos.

programme.title: Beat Bugs
programme.desc: Ar The Beatles slaveno dziesmu palīdzību, pieci draudzīgi kukaiņi apgūst svarīgas mācības par apkārtējo pasauli, nepametot savu pagalmu.

programme.title: Muminu ieleja
programme.desc: Ziņkārīgs un ideālistisks Mumintrollis ar savu neparasto ģimeni un kaprīzajiem draugiem aizvedīs mūs piedzīvojumos Muminielejas maģiskajā pasaulē. Dažkārt viņi dosies tālāk par ieleju uz lielajiem plašumiem, milzīgajiem, tumšajiem mežiem, noslēpumainām, tālām salām un vientuļiem, bīstamiem kalniem.

All of the tribes live in Rainbow Kindi, a vibrant and vivid world where the characters interact, often leading to hilarious events and situations. Young children are invited to join the colourful characters as they enjoy yet another series of amazing adventures.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Saulainā Savanna
programme.desc: Brīnummeža draugi palīdz Saulainās Savannas iemītniekiem sagatavoties Spīguļojošajai Izrādei, paši iesaistoties vizuļojošajā jautrībā un vienlaikus gūstot svarīgas mācības. Saulainajā Savannā kopā vienmēr ir jautrāk.

programme.title: Blinkijs Bils
programme.desc: Blinkija Bila un viņa drauga Džeko piedzīvojumi, aizsargājot savas Austrālijas mājas no īstiem un izdomātiem draudiem.

programme.title: Alas klubs "Cave Club"
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti piedzīvojumu, izpētes un pat dinozauru pasaulē. Kopā ar pieciem draugiem atklājiet negaidītu mūsdienas populārāko tendenču izcelsmi un risiniet visiem zināmas problēmas. Šie labākie draugi būs pirmie, kas visu redzēs un darīs, sākot ar pašu pirmo labāko draugu grupu "Alas klubs".

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Izmeklējot virkni satiksmes negadījumu, Dr. Frenklins Čars tiek nolaupīts. Tas aktivizē viņa radītos Tobotus. Pirmie divi Toboti tiek uzticēti viņa dēliem Raienam un Korijam, lai apkaimi sargātu no noziedzības.

programme.title: Mazā pīlēna sapnis
programme.desc: Multiplikācijas īsfilmas jaunākajiem skatītājiem.

programme.title: Обезьянки в опере
programme.desc: Тигр вместе с мамой-обезьянкой пошёл в театр на «Отелло». Из-за шаловливых обезьянок актриса-Дездемона сбежала, и по просьбе режиссера мама-обезьяна заменяет её.

programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: 38 попугаев
programme.desc: Веселые истории о забавных приключениях четырех друзей — болтливой Мартышки, застенчивого Слоненка, разумного Попугая и задумчивого Удава.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Баба Яга против
programme.desc: О хитроумных кознях и происках Бабы Яги и Кощея Бессмертного назло Олимпийскому мишке.

programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: Трое из Простоквашино
programme.desc: Жил-был мальчик по прозвищу Дядя Федор. Он очень любил животных, но его родители и слышать ничего не хотели о том, чтобы в их квартире завелся кто-то хвостатый и лохматый. И пришлось Дяде Федору со своими новыми приятелями — котом Матроскиным и верным песиком Шариком — отправиться в деревню Простоквашино.

programme.title: Пингвин

programme.title: Приключения пингвиненка Лоло 3
programme.desc: Лоло и Пепе попадают на браконьерское судно, где томится в клетке еще один пингвиненок по имени Мак.

programme.title: Чебурашка идет в школу
programme.desc: Крокодил Гена выясняет, что Чебурашка не умеет читать и хочет устроить его в школу. Им неожиданно помогает старуха Шапокляк, которая устраивает срочное завершение ремонта школы к первому сентября. Крокодил Гена становится преподавателем по живой природе.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Лев и заяц
programme.desc: Поставлен по мотивам одноименной басни народного поэта Дагестана Гамзата Цадасы. Это простой и занимательный рассказ о жестоком и жадном льве и умном, находчивом зайце, который победил царя зверей и спас от гибели своих товарищей.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Котенок по имени Гав
programme.desc: Мультфильм рассказывает о приключениях котёнка с необычным именем Гав и его друга — щенка.

programme.title: Возвращение блудного попугая
programme.desc: Мультик про попугая Кешу, который убежал от Вовки и решил жить самостоятельно.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Заколдованый мальчик
programme.desc: Мультипликационный фильм по мотивам повести С. Лагерлеф "Чудесное путешествие Нильса с дикими гусями". Сказочная история рассказывает об озорнике Нильсе, который обидел волшебного Гнома, за что был наказан: превращен в карлика и унесен гусями в Лапландию. Много благородных поступков совершил мальчик, прежде чем Гном снял с него чары.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. programme.desc: Доброму коту Леопольду, постоянно досаждают две мышки, требующие взаимности…

programme.title: Влюбчивая ворона
programme.desc: Появилась в лесу смешная, но прелестная влюбчивая ворона. Восхитилась Зайцем: "Глаза у тебя не косые, а раскосые…"; влюбилась в Волка, и тот забыл свои болезни; увлеклась Медведем… Перессорились звери из-за внимания Вороны и … выгнали ее из леса. А потом загрустили. Но Ворона вернулась! И не одна…

programme.desc: Этот сериал создан для наших маленьких зрителей. Мы предлагаем Вам отправиться в удивительный мир, полный фантазий и захватывающих приключений. programme.title: По щучьему велению
programme.desc: Крестьянский парень Емеля отпускает пойманную им щуку обратно в реку. Щука награждает парня волшебным даром исполнения всех его желаний. Емеля, сам того не зная, влюбляет в себя царевну Марью, которая отказывается выйти замуж за заморского принца. Разобиженный принц идёт войной на царство…

programme.title: Маша и волшебное варенье
programme.desc: О том, как нехорошо врать и о том, что тайное всегда становится явным. Маша сьедает бабушкино варенье и говорит, что это сделала кошка. Бабушка рассказывает внучке, что варенье волшебное: кто его сьест, тот уменьшится. Маше показалось, что она стала маленькой и кошка хочет наказать её за обман.

programme.title: Ваня и Крокодил
programme.desc: История о том, как в Петрограде появляется Крокодил и пугает обитателей города. Его не боится маленький мальчик Ваня Васильчиков. Крокодил оказывается не страшным и заводит дружбу с Ваней.

Superstructures: Engineering Marvels
programme.desc: This brand new series reveals the extraordinary feats of engineering hidden inside the world's most spectacular man-made constructions. From the world's biggest plane and largest free-spanning dome to the tallest building and the largest space ship, each superstructure is taken apart using state-of-the-art CGI and insight from world class specialists to reveal the startling innovations that turn it from dream to reality.

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures: Russia's War
programme.desc: This is the story of Hitler's invasion of Russia, of the biggest invasion force ever assembled in military history and the lesser-known story of how the Germans met their match on the shores of the Black Sea at Sevastopol – one of the world's most heavily defended strongholds. Never before or ever again would the Germans amass such a devastating artillery force with mega-weapons of such extraordinary firepower.

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures: Russia's War
programme.desc: This is the story of Hitler's attempts to liquidate the Russian people and gain living space for his superior Aryan race. All the way to the gates of Moscow and back to the heart of Berlin, this is a conflict of annihilation culminating in the collapse of the Third Reich. The series reveals the cunning strategy, military technology and defensive megastructures deployed in this devastating war of brutality between giants.

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures: Russia's War
programme.desc: The tide of war with Russia has turned and the Germans face a vast Soviet army bent on revenge. Hitler's army must now rely on a series of defensive megastructures, innovative technology and grim determination, to stop the Soviet advance. The Germans battle for every inch of ground from the Baltic all the way back to the heart of Berlin. This is the story of the defensive megastructures underpinning the most brutal fighting retreat of WW2.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planet's sets the Earth apart from every other planet we've seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature you've never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz take on the restoration of a lightweight British pocket rocket , a 1997 Lotus Elise. The car's owner, 44 year old former print manager Sarah, had been planning to get the car back on the road with the help of her dad Phil until double tragedy struck – he fell victim to incurable bowel cancer then sadly Sarah herself was also diagnosed with cancer. The car's restoration was put on hold. Mother Jenny wrote in to Car SOS hoping to bring back her daughter's much needed smile.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. Initially hosted by Top Gear's Richard Hammond, and later by Dallas Campbell, this National Geographic is a comedic gem. With the first series airing episodes titled Cannon Ball Ice Dude, Learning to Fly, Jet Pack Failure and Dancing Disaster, you can guarantee that this is one of the most ridiculous shows on television. What more could you want?

programme.title: Big Fish Texas
programme.desc: Katie's Fish House is one of the busiest fisheries in the Gulf of Mexico, serving some of the nations biggest seafood companies. When one of those companies, Louisiana Foods, wants to check out some fish, Buddy calls in his brother, and top snapper captain, Kenny to oblige them. Unfortunately, impressing the buyer comes at the cost of a full day for fishing, and pay, for Kenny and his crew. Not wanting to let his crewmembers down, Kenny goes out on a turn and burn, a twenty-four hour mad-dash trip to reclaim their lost pay.

programme.title: Big Fish Texas
programme.desc: At Katie's Seafood Market the quota has increased and so have the problems. Nick now has to work double time to not only sell fish, but to find storage for the influx of snapper coming in. Meanwhile, Hans is out at sea fishing for grouper, but when problems arise he must decide whether to play it safe or risk it all. When Mac reveals that his car is broken down, Buddy takes it upon himself to get it repaired. Buddy has taken a back seat in the day-to-day operations at Katie's, and has left it up to his sons to keep the business a success.

programme.title: Activate: The Global Citizen Movement
programme.desc: Emmy Award-winning actor Rachel Brosnahan teams up with Global Citizen and travels to the border of Peru to see what happens to children's education during conflicts and natural disasters. After an emotional experience with displaced families, Rachel and Global Citizen return to the U.S. where they urge Ireland, the UK, and the US to pledge millions to Education Cannot Wait, a global fund for education during crises.

programme.title: Activate: The Global Citizen Movement
programme.desc: Priyanka Chopra Jonas joins Global Citizen and activists around the globe as they campaign to break down barriers to girls' education. Meanwhile, Gayle King and Bonang Matheba rally tens of thousands of people to call on the South African government to commit $58 million towards ending "period poverty" & providing girls with the menstrual education & resources they need to stay in school & stay confident.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz travel to Stroud in Gloucestershire to take on a 1973 Hillman Imp which has been abandoned for decades in a dusty barn. The car belongs to former NHS theatre nurse Margaret (70) who has owned and loved Imps since she first started to drive. Her beloved car nicknamed "Tin Lizzie" was her pride and joy until it started to need a lot of work to keep it on the road. Aided by her husband Margaret started work on the car but mid restoration her husband passed away with COPD. Her father who took over the project but he also died shortly after, leaving mother of two Margaret without the time or the knowhow to complete the job. By the time Tim and Fuzz take the car on it has rusted away so badly it's barely a car. The Hillman Imp was compact saloon manufactured by the Rootes group in the 1960s and 70s and was their answer to the popular Austin Mini, it was a hugely innovative car with a rear mounted engine that was completely made of aluminium, but due to high production costs and frequent strike action in the 1970s it ended up getting the reputation as the car that killed off the company.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Making motoring dreams come true for an eighth season award winning Car SOS is back, and this time it's bigger and better than ever. Everyone's favourite petrol heads Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw continue their mission to seek out classic cars with deserving owners. Using all their guile and restoration knowledge their aim is to sneak away clapped out classics without their owners knowing then in a blizzard of grease and grime and hard graft get the much loved motors back where they deserve to be, on the road .In this series the boys take on their biggest challenges ever. Chronic rust, hard to find parts and broken engines test the boys to their limits. Car ranging across eight decades from a vintage tourer to a 1990s Japanese supercar, from an iconic German sports coupe to a very rare British rally winner, and, for their lucky owners the surprise they will never forget. There will be tears, there will be laughter on this automotive rollercoaster and one thing that will be guaranteed – there will be some very beautiful cars.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are challenged to take on probably their most obscure car to date – a little known Cannon trials competition car. Car trialling is the world's second oldest motorsport, and involves taking specially adapted cars up steep slippery hills and through thick mud courses, it was huge in the 1950s and 60s but today is less well known. Cannon cars were probably the most famous and successful cars on the trialling circuit – all hand-made by Tasmanian farmer Mike Cannon, who settled in the UK in the 1950s to build cars. One of the most successful cars that Cannon produced was known as Goldfinger as it was built in 1964 – the same year the Bond film of the same name was released – and it is that very car that Tim and Fuzz have been called in to fix. The car is owned by former bus driver Dean – a car trialling fanatic whose active life was tragically cut short eight years ago when he suffered a catastrophic stroke that resulted in him having an inability to communicate. Dean is now slowly recovering but the part of his brain that deals with speech was all but destroyed meaning he has had to relearn how to speak and also he still suffers regular seizures. In their quest to find out more about trialling Tim and Fuzz end up in a full blown event – you will have to watch the programme to find out how they did.

programme.title: Cosmos: Possible Worlds
programme.desc: The human understanding of the universe is very limited but there is one man who believes that our future is greater than anyone thought possible. Neil deGrasse Tyson explores how we could look at space and space travel in the near and distant future, discussing our discovery of the laws of nature and how to find our exact coordinates in the universe. From our own planet we will take a journey through our solar system, galaxy and beyond to seek answers as to whether human habitation is possible on other planets and if there is, possibly, intelligent alien life already out there. The Cosmos is vast and holds endless answers yet even more questions. Asking those questions is only the beginning. Documentary series.

programme.title: Cosmos: Possible Worlds
programme.desc: The human understanding of the universe is very limited but there is one man who believes that our future is greater than anyone thought possible. programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: After almost a decade alone on Mars, scientists at IMSF's now fully developed Olympus Town settlement prepare for the arrival of a group of highly skilled astronauts working for Lukrum, a for-profit corporation specializing in natural-resource extraction. On board the world's northernmost oil platform, extreme conditions make for a Mars-like work environment. A worker shares the struggles of being away from his family for three weeks at a time.

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: The tenuous coexistence between the two Mars colonies threatens to dissolve. Greenpeace activists take to the seas to protest Arctic oil drilling. Relations between IMSF and Lukrum, now sharing a common water and power source, face rising tensions set off by a new discovery, Hana deals with a personal tragedy, and Amelie prepares to return to Earth. In present day, Greenpeace activists take to the seas to protest Arctic oil drilling in the Barents Sea and the effectiveness of such tactics are examined.

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: When a solar flare strikes the planet and knocks out communications between and within the colonies, the Olympus Town team races against the clock to locate Marta, who becomes stranded on the surface during a rogue research expedition. In present day, a scientist and his team brave harsh and dangerous conditions in the pursuit of data that will help predict the effects of glacial melt on global sea levels.

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: From the National Geographic comes a science fiction series following a group of astronauts as they attempt to colonise Mars in 2033. With real-life scientists, the show is part documentary, part fictional narrative, as the scientists explain the actions of the astronauts in the dramatisations. The show is based on the book How We'll Live on Mars by Stephen Petranek and explores the difficulties the human race will endure if, or when, they attempt to set foot on the red planet. Created by Ben Young Mason and Justin Wilkes, the show was produced by Ron Howard and features performances from Ben Cotton, Jihae Kim, Clémentine Poidatz and Alberto Ammann.

programme.title: Filthy Riches
programme.desc: Albert DeSilva must race to the canyons of Martinez, CA to extract a veneer burl worth $4000. At over a ton, getting it out will be a dangerous operation. On the Delaware River, Ray Turner is having a difficult time keeping up with the demand for his smoked eels. Ray has only one day to fill his shelves with more eels, or he risks losing valuable customers. North of Ray, on the coastal mudflats of Maine, Jim and Andy are looking for a new spot to dig bloodworms. They decide to test their luck at The Reach. The Reach is usually full of worms, but to get there, the guys will have to venture down a dangerous cliff. In the mountains of Kentucky, Billy Taylor asks his son Caleb and friend Lee to help him fill a large order for ginseng for a new client. After a long day of searching, Billy hopes that his new client will be impressed with the quality of seng.

programme.title: Filthy Riches
programme.desc: All across the country, American mavericks are working hard for every dollar they earn. On the Delaware River, eel fisherman Ray Turner faces a huge lightning storm as he paddles to his weir. In Oregon, Greg Dahl and Albert DeSilva struggle to remove a 1,500-pound burl from the side of a steep, craggy hill. Across the country in Maine, Jim Campbell and Andy Johns get into a heated battle with two worm diggers who are trying to dig on their turf. And in the woods of Michigan, Chris and Levena are trying to find mushrooms that have not been damaged by recent heavy rains. Everyday is a battle with the elements if you want to make a living off the land.

programme.title: Airport Security: Rome
programme.desc: When the Pope arrives at Fiumicino airport, much drama ensues. The Italian anti-narcotics police find heroin hidden on the shoes of a man traveling from Belgium. Three Bangladeshi passengers may be travelling on fake passports and police must uncover their true identity. A Turkish couple are in danger of missing their daughter's wedding when they can't find one of their passports. A man arriving from London begs police not to search his bag.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: At Jorge Chavez International Airport in Lima, Peru, security personnel work to stop the flow of drugs out of the country. A divorced couple denies traveling together, but carry identical bags filled with cocaine. A bag containing a white powder tests negative for cocaine, and police decide to dig deeper. A suspect hides cocaine in the handles of his carry-on. A man is found with over 35 capsules of cocaine in his belly.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Peru's Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: School of Rock

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.
